node.title: Escaping Labor Camps and Finding God
node.description: Jack Blanco's father abandoned him at an early age and he was raised by his mother around the time of World War II.  He was sent to several labor camps but was able to miraculously escape with his life. Later he was drafted into the US Airforce and was stationed in Guam where he came across a Bible and learned that there is a heavenly Father that loved him.
